name: Ultrabug
description:
Ultrabug

Within the depths of an unlit basement, a mad scientist seeks revenge on those who slighted him. The tool of his vengeance is the Ultrabug, an ultra deadly, ultra cute, ultra virus capable of bypassing any fire wall, blasting through any anti-virus and wrecking havoc directly on the system. Take control of the Ultrabug in this chaotic ping pong shooter and bring and end to modern computer security standards.

Controls

WASD or Arrow keys for movement

Left click to shoot

Right click for shield

Escape to pause

Art by Fantro

Voice by RuffinVangarr
